question: Which country accounts for the largest share in the world export of manufactures?
explanation:
Western Europe, Asia and North America are the leading regions in terms of their share in the exports of manufactured commodities.
At the level of the individual countries, the largest share in the world exports of manufactures are accounted for by US (14.0%), Germany (9.9%), Japan (9.7%), France (5.3%) and UK (5%).
